TopicTitle: Help: Tutorial - Creating your first module

Articles.Content:
Hello!

I am new to programming and thus have been trying to follow the tutorial at

http://wiki.kerbalspaceprogram.com/wiki/Tutorial:Creating_your_first_module

I am using VS2013 Community Edition and have successfully added the Unity engine and KSP dll's

I now have a couple of questions,

  1. Should I still be setting my project to target .net 3.5 ?
  2. How do I compile the DLL as it requests in my attached image?

Kind regards,

Ash

- - - Updated - - -

Oh noe #.....

1) yes

2) F6 (or the build menu). The dll should be in your project folder in bin/debug or bin/release depending of your current build settings.
